description.value: The first time each round that you Cycle Elemental Stance, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level that last until the start of your next turn. After you've gained temporary Hit Points for entering a specific elemental stance, you can't gain temporary Hit Points from entering that stance again until you've entered every other elemental stance you know or 10 minutes passes, whichever comes first.
